Spacious ,very bright one bedroom basement apt in a nice and safe house with separate entrance in an excellent location of Bathurst between Finch & Steels.
10 minutes bus ride To York University, 5 minutes walk to all shops and TTC and direct bus to Finch Subway.
Newly renovated, fresh paint, hardwood floor. Separate entrance.
Semi furnished, four appliances (fridge,stove, washer, drier), 3-peice bathroom. Big storage. Air conditioned.
Parking available.
1/3 utility.
No pets &smokers Please.
